hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Salama:`Aisha the wife of the Prophet (ﷺ) said, "I used to sleep in front o Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) and my legs were opposite his Qibla and in prostration he pushed my legs and I withdrew then and when he stood, I stretched them.' `Aisha added, "In those days the houses were without lights

chapter.eng-name: To offer As-Salat (the prayers) on the bed
